name: Alpaco AI & MCPs
description: It’s a crypto infofi platform built by everyday traders like us, made for everyone. Our goal? Make trading safe, simple, and fun with free tools you’ll love—all in one spot! Here’s what Alpaco brings: Safe Trading: We’ve got strong security to keep you worry-free. Find Bundles: Spot hot new assets to jump on. Rug Checks: Stay safe from scams with our token checks. Token Scores: Get clear ratings to pick the best coins. Holding Checks: See if wallets and projects are legit. Bubble Maps: Spot overhyped coins to avoid losses. Snipers: Trade fast and smart when opportunities pop up. Twitter Tracker: Catch the latest crypto buzz in real-time. MCP Server: Get crypto news, vibes, and analysis at https://mcpuse.fun/mcp News, sentiment, and summaries for any coin, any time!
